title: Daniel Messina
text:
Daniel Horacio Messina (born 5 May 1962) is a former <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> and naturalised <a href="Paraguayan">Paraguayan</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> midfielder.
After retiring as a player he coached teams in <a href="Argentina">Argentina</a> and <a href="El%20Salvador">El Salvador</a>.
